participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and ambitious, she is eager to explore new ideas and experiences as she transitions from high school to college.
participant_1.background: I go to a catholic high school in new england. I'm about to go off to college at a very liberal school soon. I have lived a very sheltered life.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and open-minded, she embraces life on the road and enjoys connecting with diverse people and cultures.
participant_2.background: I work as a freight truck driver. I have two full sleeves of tattoos. My hair is short and pink. I am a 43 year old woman. I love to travel.

content.text: What's your favorite thing about working as a truck driver?
I get to see a lot of different places and meet new people.
That sounds really cool! I'm about to go to college at a very liberal school, and I'm excited to meet new people and learn new things.
I'm sure you'll have a great time!
Thank you! I hope so too.
So, what are you looking forward to most about college?
I'm looking forward to learning new things, meeting new people, and being independent for the first time.
That's all very exciting!
Yeah, it is. I'm a little nervous, but I'm also really excited.
Well, I'm sure you'll do great.
Thank you! I hope so.
So, what are you planning to study in college?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking about majoring in business.
That's a good choice. Business is a great field to get into.
Yeah, I think so too.
So, what are your plans for after college?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking about going to law school.
That's a great goal!
Thank you! I hope I can achieve it.
I'm sure you will. You seem like a very smart and ambitious person.
Thank you! I appreciate that.
